com.mingweisamuel.zyra.util

Class TokenRateLimit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mingweisamuel.zyra.util.TokenRateLimit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RateLimit

    public class TokenRateLimit
extends Object
implements RateLimit
    Represents a App or Method rate limit (collection of buckets). Automatically initializes buckets based off of first request response.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TokenRateLimit.RateLimitType
      Type of rate limit to know what headers to check.

      • retryAfterDelay

        public long retryAfterDelay()
        Description copied from interface: RateLimit
        Get delay needed to respect retry-after headers.
        Specified by:
        retryAfterDelay in interface RateLimit
        Returns:
        Milliseconds to delay or -1 if none needed. Zero may be returned and more delay less than one millisecond is required.
